Sparkling Berry Pie

Fast, easy and delicious.

300 ml vanilla wafer crumbs (45 wafers)
 75 ml sugar
25 ml brown sugar
 25 ml lemon juice
75 ml melted butter
 1 L halved strawberries or whole raspberries
250 ml cold water
 

Combine crumbs, brown sugar and melted butter.  Press into pie plate and chill.

Pour water into medium saucepan.  Sprinkly gelatin into water and let stand 5 min.  Stir in sugar and lemon juice.  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring once.  Pour over berries and stir gently.  Chill until slightly set.  Spoon into pie shell and chill until firm.  Garnish with whipped cream or icecream.
